headline: Alliant Energy Corporation Declares Quarterly Common Stock Dividend
summary: MADISON, Wis., April 02, 2025--The Alliant Energy Corporation (NASDAQ: LNT) Board of Directors today declared a quarterly cash dividend of $0.5075 per share payable on May 15, 2025, to shareowners of record as of the close of business on April 30, 2025.
